heroDescription: If your team is still collecting client documents through email attachments, shared drives, and the occasional text message, you already know the problem. Files get lost, follow ups pile up, and nobody is quite sure whether every document has come in. Document automation services give your firm a structured, secure system for collecting, organizing, and extracting data from client documents so your team can spend their time on the work itself rather than chasing paperwork.

benefits.title: A Single, Secure Place for Every Document
benefits.description: When clients have one clear place to upload their files and your team has one place to find them, the confusion disappears. Secure portals replace the scattered mix of email threads and shared folders with a system that keeps everything organized by client, engagement, and document type.

benefits.title: Significantly Less Time Spent Chasing Documents
benefits.description: Automated reminders and request sequences follow up with clients on your behalf when documents are outstanding. Your team no longer needs to remember who still owes what or draft individual follow up messages. The system handles the nudges so you can focus on the deliverables.

benefits.title: Faster Data Entry Through Extraction Technology
benefits.description: OCR and data extraction tools can pull key information directly from uploaded documents, reducing the manual data entry that slows down your workflow. This typically means your team spends less time re keying numbers and more time reviewing and advising.

features.title: Secure Client Upload Portals
features.description: We set up branded, secure portals where your clients can upload documents directly. Each portal is organized by document type and engagement, giving clients a clear picture of what has been submitted and what is still needed.
details: Branded upload experience that matches your firm's look and feel
Document checklists so clients can see exactly what you need from them
Automatic confirmation notifications when documents are successfully received

features.title: Automated Document Requests and Follow Ups
features.description: Document request workflows go out automatically based on engagement stage or calendar date. When items remain outstanding, the system sends polite follow up reminders at intervals you define, escalating when needed without your team getting involved.
details: Scheduled request sequences triggered by workflow milestones or due dates
Customizable reminder intervals and messaging that match your firm's tone
Integration with platforms like LedgerDocs for streamlined document tracking and collection

features.title: OCR and Data Extraction Workflows
features.description: Once documents arrive, OCR and data extraction tools can read and categorize them automatically. This means uploaded receipts, bank statements, and tax forms can be processed and routed to the right place with minimal manual handling.
details: Optical character recognition that pulls text and numbers from scanned documents
Automated categorization and filing based on document type
Extracted data routed directly into your accounting or practice management system

faqs.question: Is the client upload portal secure enough for sensitive financial documents?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The portals we implement use encrypted connections and secure storage, which is exactly what you need when handling financial and tax documents. We configure access controls so only authorized team members can view each client's files. Your clients get the peace of mind that comes with knowing their sensitive information is protected, and you get the compliance confidence your firm needs.

faqs.question: What if our clients are not comfortable using a portal?
faqs.answer: That is a fair concern, and honestly most clients adapt quickly once they see how simple the experience is. The portals we build are designed to be straightforward, with clear instructions and minimal steps. For clients who need a little more hand holding, we can set up guided onboarding emails that walk them through the process. In our experience, once clients use the portal for one engagement, they prefer it over the old email back and forth.

faqs.question: Can document automation integrate with our existing accounting software?
faqs.answer: In most cases, yes. We commonly implement tools like LedgerDocs that are designed to work alongside popular accounting and practice management platforms. During our discovery process, we look at your current tech stack and design the document workflows to fit into what you already use rather than replacing everything. The goal is to reduce manual steps, not add new complexity.
